Hero.description: Specializing in operational automation for founders drowning in admin.

0.body: I was lucky to have worked with Gabriel on our project. He immediately took the lead and communicated with our team on a consistent basis providing updates and asking questions about the product we were building. He not only has a strong understanding of application development but also understood the business implications of the product we were building and took the time to educate himself on the audience we were building it for. His leadership was paramount in delivering our product on time and in scope.
0.author: Zach Hodder

Problem.label: The Problem
Problem.headline: Administrative bottlenecks are stifling your growth.
Problem.subheadline: Your team is spending valuable liquidity on low-leverage tasks. Recover that operational bandwidth.

recruiting.name: Buried in Admin?
recruiting.description: Stop drowning in paperwork. specialized agents handle scheduling, invoicing, and data entry automatically.

dashboards.name: Slow Lead Follow-up?
dashboards.description: Never miss a deal. AI agents engage leads instantly, qualify them, and book meetings 24/7.

workflows.name: Flying Blind?
workflows.description: Get clarity instantly. Real-time dashboards that pull data from all your tools into one view.

AboutMe.headline: The 'Hybrid' Developer
AboutMe.description: Business Background + Full Stack Skills. I don't just write code; I understand P&L, Operations, and Growth. I build systems that actually move the needle for your business.

GlobalReach.headline: Global Perspective
GlobalReach.description: Collaborating across continents. I work fluently in English, French, Portuguese, and Spanish, bridging cultural and technical gaps for clients in Brazil, Canada, and France.
